ON AFTER BIRTH
(within one hour) 
Checking the mother and newborn soon 
after birth (within 1 hour) is important to 
detect and treat complications that can 
occur after delivery, and to educate the 
mother (and her companion) about 
danger signs for which she should call 
for help.
